it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller

Class ToolCardAMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
      • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.ControllerMessage
        • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.ToolCardAMessage

  • public class ToolCardAMessage
extends ControllerMessage
    Contains the information about the use of a tool card number 1, 5, 6, 10 or 11 as all of them regard a die from the draft pool and usually give the player a choice between two actions, like increasing or decreasing the value of a selected die.

    Contains everything needed to be transformed into a Json string to be sent across the network as a source of information.

      ToolCardAMessage(int num, int dieIndex, int action)
      Class constructor specifying the number of the tool card (1, 5, 6, 10 or 11), the index of a die from the draft pool and an identifier of the action.

      • ToolCardAMessage

        public ToolCardAMessage(int num,
                        int dieIndex,
                        int action)
        Class constructor specifying the number of the tool card (1, 5, 6, 10 or 11), the index of a die from the draft pool and an identifier of the action.
        Parameters:
        num - the number of the tool card.
        dieIndex - the index of the die from the draft pool.
        action - the identifier of the action which depends on the particular tool card.
